verses.name: Leviticus 8:1
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.name: Leviticus 8:2
verses.text: Take Aaron and his sons with him, and the garments, and the anointing oil, and a bullock for the sin offering, and two rams, and a basket of unleavened bread;

verses.name: Leviticus 8:3
verses.text: And gather thou all the congregation together unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation.

verses.name: Leviticus 8:4
verses.text: And Moses did as the Lord commanded him; and the assembly was gathered together unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation.

verses.name: Leviticus 8:5
verses.text: And Moses said unto the congregation, This is the thing which the Lord commanded to be done.
